oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mexican War saber & scabbard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The "Old Wristbreaker," model 1840 heavy cavalry saber used during the Mexican War through 1867. The term "heavy" was used after 1857 when the light saber was adopted. Thousands of the heavy wooden-gripped sabers were used during the Civil War. The new-style grips would have had coppers wire and leather covering.
